structure.unit: Inland Fisheries And Game And Other Natural Resources

law.catch_line: Trap, Net Or Snare; Use Restricted
law.text: Except as provided in sections four, five, thirty-seven, thirty-eight and eighty-three, a person shall not erect, set, use, locate, repair, tend or maintain any trap, net or snare for the purpose of taking or killing any bird or mammal, nor shall a person, except as provided above, take any bird or mammal by any such means.
